sentences.en: He is a proverbially dour New England Puritan.
sentences.cn: 他是个众所周知的抑郁的新英格兰清教徒。

sentences.en: It is proverbially easier to destroy than to construct.
sentences.cn: 谁都知道破坏容易建设难.

sentences.en: Minute fragments of shoot apices are proverbially difficult to culture.
sentences.cn: 微小的茎尖切段通常是难以培养的.

sentences.en: Taking the first step proverbially costs the most.

sentences.cn: 众所周知,警察喜欢追根究底.

words.tran_cn: 谚语的；众所周知的；谚语式的
